RHighlight.p: The highlight of our trip was the cuisine. A new chef was on board, fresh from stints in five-star hotels, and we really were impressed with his culinary skills. We also loved the pool area, and appreciated the supremely comfortable bed which rewarded us with dream-filled slumber.

RSurroundArea.p:
For folks who enjoy the beach, a sophisticated nightlife, eating out in classy restaurants and shopping at designer boutiques, Casa Brio is positioned in the perfect spot, while being 750m from the main road helps keep most of the noise of the immediate location at bay. Many of the restaurants and shops are within easy walking distance, or you may prefer to make use of the villa’s car and driver (available for 8 hours per day at an additional charge). Sarong, Métis, and Sardine are just three of the high-end dining options in the vicinity. Mid-range options include Wah Burger, which specialises in sassy gourmet burgers with sexy connotations, and there are numerous cheap and cheerful options as well.
The beach closest to the villa is known as Petitenget Beach (750m) and is the western extension of the Seminyak/Legian/Kuta beach. Here you can rent sunbeds and umbrellas, surf, swim between the flags in the areas patrolled by lifeguards, or take long seaside walks. Easiest access to the beach is via carpark outside ‘La Lucciola’ Restaurant – which is great for sunset drinks – or alternatively you can take an armchair seat to watch the sunset from a beachside terrace at The Breeze at The Samaya from the villa). Otherwise, Ku Dé Ta (1km) or the beachclub known as Potato Head (1km) are the places to see and be seen – especially around sunset. Nightlife within five minutes’ walking distance of the villa includes The Living Room which becomes lively after dinner guests have finished eating. Jalan Kayu Aya (aka Jalan Laksmana) is also full of designer boutiques, with another wonderful selection on the main road in Seminyak along with many stylish homeware stores. Just further afield in Kerobokan there are countless antique shops and furniture workshops and showrooms.

ROverallComments.p:
Casa Brio was a delightful surprise — everything was so much bigger and better than we anticipated; the photos really don’t do it justice.
We were particularly impressed with manager Pak Yusa and his staff, who made sure we wanted for nothing during our stay from the moment they welcomed us with an ice-cold towel and fresh juice. A special shout out to Wayan the villa chef whose culinary skills ensured we never dined out (even though our old-time favourite, La Lucciola was only a five-minute stroll away). My taste buds still tingle at the thought of his delicately flavoured pomelo and chicken salad, and beautifully presented mahi mahi steaks.
This feels very much like a ‘grown up’ villa — we can easily imagine elegant dinner parties and special family celebrations, and think it’s a great villa for friends to share. Families with toddlers might be concerned about the open staircase and rooftop terrace (not to mention sticky fingers all over the handsome upholstered furniture). But the staff enjoy welcoming children, can supply a pool fence on request, and there’s a large shallow pool area for young ones to enjoy.

RUnpleasantSurprise.p: The villa felt a little impersonal in terms of interiors, the seating area in the living pavilion perhaps a tad too ‘hotel lobby’ for our tastes — bare shelves were asking for decorative items, books and magazines. But our stay was just before some interior redesign was completed, so this will change. The biggest surprise was positive; we couldn’t get over how quiet the villa was, given its central Seminyak location.

REVIEW.Name: Taksu Bali Travel & Weddings Taksu Bali Travel & Weddings
Karen Birkbeck
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa was absolutley perfect for our group. Nothing was too much trouble for the wonderful staff. The villa was like a home away from home. We will never stay in another hotel room again!!!

REVIEW.Name: Laura .
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Gorgeous out door living areas and great location! The staff's attention to detail and security was very impressive.

REVIEW.Name: Naga R Ampalam
REVIEW.ROverallComments: All four couples agreed that we had stumbled upon a jewel of a villa. We will certainly return and spread the news around to our friends. Keep up the good work.

REVIEW.Name: Jessica Crossin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Amazing villa. Staff were exceptional, in particular Devi, Budi, Yusa and Made. Chef cooked superb meals. Close proximity to great restaurants. No gym facility, but staff directed us to a gym nearby and drove us each day.

REVIEW.Name: Belinda Corless
REVIEW.ROverallComments: My friends and I loved our stay at Villa Casa Brio. The staff were amazing - so friendly, attentive, but allowed us our privacy. The food was fantastic, and the cocktails were great too. Made, our driver, was so lovely, as were all of our lovely butlers. The staff made everything so easy for us - confirming restaurant reservations, adapting to our changing plans, making lovely snacks - nothing was ever too much trouble.

REVIEW.Name: Alane Gauci
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Casa Brio and the staff where everything and more could not fault the villa in anyway all the staff could not do enough for us. My husband and I took our twin girls there for there 21st and they where blown away with the amazing size of the villa. I am ever so thank full to the amazing staff who looked after us :)

REVIEW.Name: Matthew Collingridge
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a wonderful place - an oasis of calm, great layout, attentive staff and a generally excellent chill out zone. Thanks for hosting our tour party - Seminyak rocks as does Villa Casa Brio !

REVIEW.Name: Monique Mcintosh
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all for making this a wonderful family holiday for both families. Your services and attention to detail at every level will ensure that we certainly return to Casa Brio.

REVIEW.Name: Sarah Van Rooyen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A very big “thank you” for a truly wonderful stay. We enjoyed the wonderful villa, the excellent food and kindness to the children. We look forward to seeing you all again in the future.

REVIEW.Name: Paul Takac
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa is very comfortable with generous sized bedrooms and bathrooms. Excellent outdoor facilities and very well suited for families, particularly those with young children. The pool is very practical as are the gardens which enjoy significant shaded as well as sunny areas.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all the wonderful staff at Casa Brio. We couldn’t of wished for a nicer villa and such friendly staff. Our holiday was so beautifully and comfortable. We found Casa Brio an excellent location for what we needed. Our in-villa massage were extremely good, such a lovely touch.

REVIEW.Name: Kate Ansbro
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Big thank you to the staff for a very special 5 days here at Casa Brio. The villa is excellent – friendly, comfortable, well equipped and support of excellent staff. Thank once again and we will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Lauren Jones
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for making Casa Brio our home during our stay in Bali. Your wonderful care and kindness made us feel so welcome and we appreciate all you did for us. Take care and we will see you again soon.

REVIEW.Name: Hoe Yeen Leng Michelle
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for such lovely care and attention, the staff has been nothing less than excellent. The villa is perfect, it’s been a great few days here and all of us definitely want to come back another time. Do take care guys, we certainly hope to see you the next time we come back to Bali, but until than, stay lovely.

REVIEW.Name: Milda Ratkelyte
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The stay at Casa Brio was amazing. The villa is beautiful and very convenient, perfect for 2 families as it has 2 king size and 2 twin rooms (these can be converted to doubles). The location could not be any better with Seminyak's happening spots just few steps away. The staff were very attentive and very friendly, recommending the places to eat and go out to, however without being intrusive. The food prepared by in-house chef was yummy! Thanks for a great stay! Will be back!

REVIEW.Name: Nomad The Luxe agent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Greatly appreciate your gracious & dedicated service during our stay. The villa is great, but it is your great smile, attitude and support that made the difference. Fantastic food, feels like home. Thank you so much for having us.

REVIEW.Name: Stacey Nan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Absolutely great! Villa was prefectly designed and maintained very well. Spotless clean. Friendly staffs gave us warmest hospitality.in house chef was fantastic, offered us many signature dishes. Good location, close to all amenities. Definitely recommended!

REVIEW.Name: Charu Madan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for your care and warm welcome. We had a very wonderful stay. Everyone was happy for everything. Lovely villa, we love the design and open air living area. Food was fantastic, even better than some of the so-called famous restaurants. Thank you again for Made, you are very kind. You made our stay enjoyable and memorable. Will come back again for sure.

REVIEW.Name: Ronald Ling
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our stay here has been nothing short of AMAZING!! We have been very well taken care of and are extremely grateful for all personalized attention and the all-round warm reception you guys have accorded to us. Thank you for making our stay so smooth and comfortable. We look forward to the next time we meet!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for the beautiful time. Your service and your kindness was just perfect.

REVIEW.Name: Tiffany Larter
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for all your work. Staff were all amazing and so helpful throughout our stay. Service & food was fantastic. Would highly recommend.

REVIEW.Name: Cortney Lessard
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Dearest Casa Brio staff (Yusa, Made, Devi, Agus, Made, Mia and all of the amazing staff we didn't get a chance to meet). we can't thank you enough for your incredible hospitality. This has been our best vacation yet (and we all have traveled to many countries all over the world). The food (Agus, you are incredible), the service and the general cleanliness are world class, and we can't say enough about how incredibly happy we are. This trip had many smile stories for both our families and we are grateful for you all in helping make it so memorable. We will definitely be back.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had a wonderful stay and the staff couldn't have been more helpful to make our holiday truly relaxing. Thank you for sharing your beautiful villa with 7 ladies.

REVIEW.Name: Martin Alcott
REVIEW.ROverallComments: You will be sick of reading how good Casa Brio is but we can only report more of the same. Devi, Made, Ketut, Chef and all the other staff make our stay a delight! Seafood BBQ in the villa for 10 was a highlight. Thank you to Yusa & his team. Like most others, we will be back!!.

REVIEW.Name: Olive Hsien
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for an amazing experience at Bali. The meals were fabulous and everyone was very friendly and helpful, made our stay a memorable one. Will definitely return and recommend Casa Brio Villa to our friends back home.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for an amazing experience for our first time in Bali. The service has been amazing and it has been a wonderful place to make memories to keep forever. The staff were very accommodating and helpful, even when making Indian food. We will be back so very soon.

REVIEW.Name: Blake Cannavo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To the wonderful beautiful people staffing at Casa Brio, We wish to thank you for being so accommodating to our needs during our stay. We are so glad that we choose to stay here as you have helped us in so many ways every single day. We are forever grateful.

REVIEW.Name: Cheryl Anne Tan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a wonderful stay. The team at Casa Brio especially Ketut our driver has been very accommodating and patient with our requests. The food is good, particularly mie soto!

REVIEW.Name: Sharmin Foo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to Devi and Made for making our stay super comfortable. They were very helpful with making sure our meals were taken care of.

REVIEW.Name: Katie Craig
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A huge thank you to Devi, Made and the entire team at Casa Brio for making our stay so wonderful and memorable. We have a brilliant 5 days here and the staff were all so lovely and helpful. We hope we can come back again one day soon.

REVIEW.Name: Felix Wilhelm
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Devi, all the Made’s and everyone else at villa. We have had an amazing week in Bali and a wonderful holiday. We could not have asked for a more wonderful team to help us look after the boys (and everything else). Hopefully we’ll return one day.

REVIEW.Name: Michael Shugg
REVIEW.ROverallComments: From the moment we walked through the gates we knew we were in for an amazing holiday. You have been so lovely and friendly to us, accommodating all our requests. We visited many fabulous restaurants but the food we had here was just as good. Thank you for your wonderful hospitality. We will miss Casa Brio and all your happy faces.

REVIEW.Name: Butler by The Sea Pty Ltd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for an amazing experience at Casa Brio. We all had a fantastic holiday and relaxing trip. The villa is beautiful, the pool is great and our kids want to stay here “forever”. It is really well set up for a family holiday experience (ie, kids + grandparents). The staff were friendly and always willing to help and give advice. If you want a personable holiday as compared with larger style hotel, this is a good choice. We celebrated my father's 70th birthday in the villa which was decorated, we enjoyed the music and traditional Balinese dancing and BBQ (seafood/meat) in the villa. The food is delicious and great when you want to relax at “home away from home”.

REVIEW.Name: Pascale Cox-Parren
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much to the Casa Brio team for making our stay unforgettable. Special thanks for making Pascale’s birthday so memorable, she will never forget. Perhaps the future might bring us together again, we will surely remember these beautiful days when back home in the Netherlands.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Rose Property Bali Rose Property
REVIEW.ROverallComments: An amazing experience. Thank you so much for taking good care of us and our children. We will come back very soon. Staff was extra ordinary. Thank you again.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Rose Property Bali Rose Property
REVIEW.ROverallComments: An amazing experience. Thank you so much for taking good care of us and our children. We will come back very soon. Staff was extra ordinary. Thank you again.

REVIEW.Name: Yu Lin Lim
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for unforgettable experience at Casa Brio. Our two families were thoroughly spoilt by Yusa, Devi, Made and Company. Lovely, attentive staffs who whipped up delicious meals and helped us time and again with reservations, suggestions and cabs. Our stay in Bali was been made even more fabulous because of this gorgeous villa. See you soon.

REVIEW.Name: Asia Good Living
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for your outstanding service. Bintang always cold, service with smile, punctuality outstanding and fabulous food. Ideal for pool parties a 4:30am. Great security surveillance and transportation arrangements. Would recommend to all our friend, however what goes on tour stays a tour. A magnificent tour villa.

REVIEW.Name: Anna Horne
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for looking after us so well. We had a great stay. Great breakfast and always then to help with whatever we needed. We hope to come back to stay at Casa Brio again.

REVIEW.Name: Kirstine Kaasgaard
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To our dear beautiful friends at Casa Brio. You have exceeded our expectations on all levels. Whilst we have visited Bali on many occasions, we believe our experience here at Casa Brio has been without doubt the best. Thank you to Devi and Made, chef Kadek and the whole team. We will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It has been amazing being able to spend our holiday with you all. Thank you all for everything you have done whilst we were here. Wish all of you all the happiness. It was great service, food and everything was exceptional.

REVIEW.Name: Mark Mccoach
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all so much for making our stay so wonderful. What a perfect home away from home for our Bali Christmas. Last night Christmas feast was sensational and delicious. Suckling pig, BBQ fish and ribs yum. Thank you for organizing the karaoke for us. I am sure the neighbors will miss our singing tonight. We will definitely visit again.

REVIEW.Name: Terry Lim
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a great holiday, fantastic villa and a great place for big family holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Getaways Villa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for taking such beautiful care of me, our family. we have had a wonderful time. Best wish and see you another time.

REVIEW.Name: Edgar Carrithers
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Perfect service, will com back just to party with the staff. Thanks.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Perfect service!

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wonderful service. Thank you. We will come back.

REVIEW.Name: Marisa Marisa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I have stayed here for a total 8 days. Very cozy place and friendly staffs. Staffs here are more like a family. The food here is fantastic.

REVIEW.Name: Jenny Dawborn
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We loved our stay at Casa Brio, the amazing staff were so happy to do anything to help us. The food in the villa was cooked with love and was delicious. Thank you for a very special stay that we will not forget. Keep our tonic cold, we will be back again soon.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all so very much for an amazing stay. We all had a fantastic time and can't thank you for your service, food and hospitality. You were all so wonderful with our children so we are very grateful. We will certainly be back very soon.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Brothers Bali Brothers
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Kami suka dan senang.

REVIEW.Name: Daniel Paris
REVIEW.ROverallComments: "WOW" what an amazing stay. The staff were so welcoming and friendly from the moment we arrived to the time we had to leave. We did not want to go. We will definitely return to enjoy your wonderful hospitality again soon.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for a flawless experience. The villa exceeded all of our expectations and the staff was truly 5 stars. Privacy and luxury in the middle of the bustling city. We cannot wait for our next visit.

REVIEW.Name: elza syferra
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We spend nice time in here. Amazing location, amazing villa and amazing food. Bali, it is really amazing, hope to come back again.

REVIEW.Name: Asia Good Living
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Casa Brio. We had a great stay to celebrate our friends birthday.

REVIEW.Name: Janine Doepel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Absolutely fabulous villa. Well appointed, luxury at it finest. Staff above fantastic, nothing too much trouble, excellent food, beautifully served. No hesitation in returning, hopefully.

REVIEW.Name: Tarek Elmougharbel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Lovely staffs, helpful and kind.

REVIEW.Name: Mary Rossi Travel - Neutral Bay
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We absolutely loved our stay at the Casa Brio.The location was fantastic and definitely the best location we have ever stayed in Seminyak with regards to having all the best restaurants/bars on our front doorstep, all walking distance. The villa was really nice as well and a perfect size for our group of 8 people. Very spacious bedrooms.The staff at the villa were wonderful and the best I have experienced in Bali. They were very warm and friendly and could not do enough for our family. The kids were spoilt by them with lots of banana smoothies and hot chips, they loved it. Thank you very much for having us and I would not hesitate to recommend the Casa Brio to our clients and Elite Havens for a company to deal with.

REVIEW.Name: Michelle Zemanek Brannen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for amazing 7 days at beautiful Casa Brio. Thank you for making our vacation so memorable, we will always remember the wonderful time we had and we will recommend Casa Brio to all our family and friends. We will be back some day. A special thank you for making my Dad's 70th birthday celebration so special. Also for your kindness to our daughter Ella, especially for arranging the pool toys for her. Casa Brio is a simply stunning place to stay, we loved everything about it.

REVIEW.Name: TONI CHAPLIN
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Many thanks to all of the staff at Casa Brio who have made our short stay so relaxing and enjoyable. We have been cared for with happy smiles and willing attitude to help. We will miss our G&T’s made by Made and Devi served by the pool. It is hard to leave but we do hope to come back again.

REVIEW.Name: Michael Harms
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wonderful villa, wonderful staff. We loved every minute of every day. We will be back, the villa barbecues were amazing. Nothing was too much for the staff. See you next year.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a fabulous home away from home holiday to celebrate our 40th birthday. We were all able to totally relax and recharge our batteries. The villa was gorgeous with all the extra’s we could ask for. The villa staff were so fabulous in ensuring we could relax and were so helpful and friendly. We are all excited about visiting Casa Brio very soon either as a “girls trip” again or with our families. All the best and thank you again.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks for making the first week ever in Bali with my family such a wonderful experience. The kids all found the staff to be so helpful and friendly and we'd definitely return.

REVIEW.Name: Getaways Villa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A big thanks to all the staff here at Casa Brio. We had a great time and hope to come back next year. The villa is very impressive and the staff always willing to help. 9 nights was not long enough - until next time.

REVIEW.Name: Christian Deiss
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all very much for a wonderful stay. You were so welcoming and friendly to us and our kids. The food was outstanding. Thank you for a very special stay, we will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a wonderful place. The villa is fabulous, the weather has been fantastic but the best aspect of all has been the wonderful charming people who looked after us so well. We will certainly come to Bali again, now that we know what a wonderful place it is. Such of relaxing haven to come back to after a day in the heat. Your staff are such a beautiful group of caring and welcoming people. They have catered to our every need. Loved our stay here. We would definitely recommend Casa Brio to friends and family for a very relaxing gateway.

REVIEW.Name: Lokal Living Lokal Living
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A wonderful time spent at Casa Brio. The villa and the staff have made our holiday very enjoyable and a lovely memory.

REVIEW.Name: Catherine Tonkin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Four bedroom, four bathroom villa with an amazing living area and pool. Fabulous staff who are friendly, knowledgeable and accommodating. Spotless grounds, excellent WiFi and the villa menu was awesome. Great location, perfect for walking to Sarong, Potato Head and La Luciolla. We shall definitely stay here again, highly recommend this villa.

REVIEW.Name: Eliza Wagg
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a heavenly stay. The warm hospitality, food, location and grounds. Absolutely stunning.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic stay at Casa Brio. Food excellent and the team looking after us excellent. The whole experience was perfect. Hope to be back. We love you all, we have had the best time learning the language and eating the beautiful food you have prepared for us. We will miss you and hope to be back one day soon.

REVIEW.Name: Michael Harms
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To the Casa Brio "A" Team, second year in a row returning for 10 wonderful nights of bliss in Bali. Great service, great food and great location. We love you all. Thanks for looking after us.

REVIEW.Name: Nomad The Luxe agent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to the amazing staff. Fantastic team, swimming pool is so nice like the color of water. Such a good place. Thank you for amazing weekend here.

REVIEW.Name: Lisa Cox
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for looking after us so well. We had a lovely relaxing stay with lots of fun and laughter. The villa, meals, drinks and service was all above our expectations. Thanks again.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you, such an excellent villa. The service is superb, staff on site very attentive. Will definitely recommend this villa.

REVIEW.Name: TTFN Travel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for an amazing holiday. Excellent staff and villa that is beautifully cared for.

REVIEW.Name: Andianstyle
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for the holiday of a lifetime. Mum had the most wonderful 70th birthday. To the staff, thank you for everything you did for us during the entire week. You were wonderful and we appreciated it so much. The food was amazing and we will always remember Casa Brio and the wonderful people.

REVIEW.Name: Jacqueline Michelle Young
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for the perfect holiday. The staff at Casa Brio are amazing and we would recommend this beautiful villa to anyone.

REVIEW.Name: Juliet Ward
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful holiday and you looked after us all so well. Thank you so munch for all your efforts and the fantastic food. We will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for the wonderful stay. We can't speak highly enough of the staff. They went above and beyond to help us and our children. Wishing you all the best.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Family Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had an amazing time. The villa is beautiful, so serene. The staff are so kind and attentive. You have exceeded all expectations and given our family a fantastic holiday we won't forget.

REVIEW.Name: Liana Seah
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful time at Casa Brio. To begin with, the villa is very well designed, well maintained and spacious. Location is also convenient, within walking distance to beach and restaurants. But we enjoy this place so much that we had dinner at the villa twice. The Chef cooks delicious meals (the pork ribs is everyone’s favorite). We only have to pay for the ingredients. All the staff and manager made the villa even more welcoming and cozy. They are attentive and full of initiative. They really make our stay perfect. Elite Havens we appreciate the concierge service.

REVIEW.Name: Anthony Van Der Wielen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a wonderful time at Casa Brio. The stay was fantastic and the villa is brilliant. Hope to see you all again sometime soon.

REVIEW.Name: Company The Private
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much to the team for a very enjoyable stay. We had a great time, food was nice, staff was very accommodating. The villa is beautiful and very luxurious. If we come back as a group, we will definitely stay here again.

REVIEW.Name: Quay Travel Quay Travel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a fabulous time and ensuring we all had a wonderful holiday in Bali. The level of service and attention has been superb far exceeding our expectations.

REVIEW.Name: Emilie Tirona
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Casa Brio for making the Tironas have a great stay.

REVIEW.Name: Jenny Bigio
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a joy to experience Casa Brio. We had a truly comfortable stay in this small contemporary villa - more spacious than the photos. Excellent location for Seminyak and the beach. Special mention to Yusa and his staff, they really look after us from the heart. This villa has made our stay extra special. Chef Wayan is highly accomplished. We would return for his meals.

REVIEW.Name: Eric Brisson
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a memorable stay. The best of Bali is right here. Banana pancakes are not to be missed. Make time to enjoy luxurious baths and treatments. A true haven.

REVIEW.Name: Caroline Eastwood
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for making our holiday very relaxing and most enjoyable. The food was amazing, the villa beautiful and all the staff made us feel very spoilt and more than comfortable.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a beautiful stay at Casa Brio. The location and staff were amazing, very helpful and always on hand. 4 nights of bliss, thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Ross Walden
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for arranging our villa in Seminyak. We all had the most wonderful 8 days together as a family. It is a holiday we will always cherish. All the staff were absolutely fantastic and looked after every little detail. Our chef and staff were great with all the meals we ordered. We arranged to have a big American breakfast every morning with freshly squeezed orange juice, freshly cut fruit, cereals, eggs anyway and crispy bacon and tomatoes with plenty of toast just the way we ordered it. We had dinner at the villa 4 nights as we all loved sitting around together in the beautiful comfy surroundings and of course so much easier with our 11 month old baby who loved being entertained and carried around by the staff. We all went out together one night to Sardine (beautiful restaurant) leaving the baby with our lovely staff member (who’d only recently had a child of her own) to look after Will which he loved. I could not recommend this villa more highly.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a lovely stay. We felt like at home, we enjoyed the facilities, service and the wonderful villa space. Good luck for everybody.

REVIEW.Name: Asia Good Living
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for making our stay in Bali so relaxing and generally wonderful. We have been here for many times and our stay here has been definitely one of our best. The food delicious, the facilities so clean and the service top-notch and friendly. We look forward to staying here again in the future.

REVIEW.Name: Evelyn Houldin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all the beautiful staff at Casa Brio, we had fun!

REVIEW.Name: Bohyun B
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Your service was excellent. Our family had a very great time here. We hope to come here again someday.

REVIEW.Name: Deepak Nandwani
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Excellent is the word. The staff is very good, the villa was clean, the chef was very good, whatever we told him to make he did it.

REVIEW.Name: Eunice Chua
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the wonderful service you have provided during our stay. The food prepared daily was of fantastic standard. Rooms were kept clean daily.

REVIEW.Name: TTFN Travel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for another amazing stay at Casa Brio, amazing service.

REVIEW.Name: Adam Dundas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the wonderful service, help and support during our stay. You have all really played an integral part in making this holiday special.

REVIEW.Name: Barbara Myslinski
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very beautiful villa, made our friends jealous. Staff did a marvelous job hosting two large dinners for our friends and their children. Four days of great relaxation and calm, thanks to the attentive service and excellent cooking. We are very grateful to the staff.
